name: Job Forge: AI-Powered Resume Tailoring Website
description: A web tool that helps users tailor resumes to job postings by analyzing job descriptions with AI, providing personalized recommendations, and enabling job application tracking through a dashboard.

name: Outfitted: A Fashion App for Genuine Self-Expression
description: A fashion inspiration app that removes likes and followers to create an inclusive space for authentic style sharing. Outfitted empowers users to tag, organize, and explore outfits without the pressures of social media popularity.
